definition: to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound

sentences.english: They look enterprising from the first minute of the kick-off.
sentences.chinese: 从开球的第一分钟起他们就显得很有进取心。

sentences.english: Enterprise clarifies, cuts through, and captures, the essence of the evolutionary spirit.
sentences.chinese: 进取心可以厘清一切，披荆斩棘直捣演化的精髓。

sentences.english: BWell I'm definitely a team player as well as being highly self-motivated.
sentences.chinese: 我绝对是个好的合作者而且有很强的进取心。

sentences.english: An aggressive young man can go far in our firm.
sentences.chinese: 有进取心的青年人在本公司能大展宏图。

sentences.english: A teacher saw her gumption and mentored her.
sentences.chinese: 一位老师看她很有进取心，给她进行辅导。

sentences.english: Interviewee: Well I’m definitely a team player as well as being highly self-motivated.
sentences.chinese: 我绝对是个好的合作者而且有很强的进取心。

sentences.english: Finally, this distinction warns that enterprise can morph into greed.
sentences.chinese: 最后，这个区别警告我们进取心也可以坠入贪婪中。

sentences.english: The sand-cobble is often considered as a difficult sampling layer.
sentences.chinese: 砂卵石层是钻进取心困难的地层。

sentences.english: An aggressive man must be a go-getter.
sentences.chinese: 一个有进取心的认一定是个积极能干的人。

sentences.english: The flaw in my character which she had already spotted was lack of "gumption".
sentences.chinese: 在我的性格中，她已经发现的弱点缺少“进取心”。

sentences.english: Highly motivated, able to take the initiative, capable of working dependently .
sentences.chinese: 有高度进取心，能主动和独立开展工作。

sentences.english: Well I'm definitely a team player as well as being highly self-motivated.
sentences.chinese: 我绝对是个好的合作者而且有很强的进取心。

sentences.english: He has no enterprise at all in his studies.
sentences.chinese: 他在学业上一点也没有进取心。

sentences.english: He's a well-disciplined , highly-motivated person with a strong desire to succeed.
sentences.chinese: 他纪律性强，进取心强，有明确的人生目标。

sentences.english: Employers are always impressed by go-getters.
sentences.chinese: 雇主总是对负有进取心的人印象深刻。

sentences.english: Others said Bergkamp was not aggressive enough.
sentences.chinese: 其他人说博格坎普不够有进取心。

definition: to take things as they are (idiom)/to leave a situation as it is/to be happy with the status quo
to show initiative/to be a go-getter/to push forward with one's agenda
to make progress/to do better/fig. ambitious to improve oneself/to move forwards
